content:
25, 2015
												This game is amazing, when you look at all of the art and badges and cards it looks really weird, but the game itself is not only challenging and unique, but if you decide to ever delve into the pit which is the backstory and come up with your own theories, this becomes the best game in existence. I am trash at this game, it's rare I get past frozen city, and of writing this I have 45 hours in Nuclear Throne and I have only GOTTEN TO the final boss once, where I died, brutally. Nuclear Throne is a top-down randomly generated bullet-heaven, whenever you kill an enemy, your soul iscrushed if you don't snatch up their radiotion before it fades into oblivion, this makes the game very anti camping and even though you can get rocket launchers and crossbows, you never feel overpowered, miniguns will drain your ammo, and super bazookas are just as likely to kill your enemy as you. I love this game, I love vlambeer. and I wish I could draw so I could show my support even more. press B for Y.V luv

												One of the best games i ever played, imagine Binding of isaac with guns, Explosions and a Nuclear Apocalypse. Play it with Mouse and keyboard, with Controller it's really hard to Play.I think i needed around 50 Hours before my first Loop, and it only gets better and better,                                                               it feels absolutely awesome if you beat Big Dog, Lil Hunter or the Throne for the first Time.The game has 14 Characters, and a lot of Weapons seperated into Bullet, Shell, Energy, Explosive, Bolt and Melee Categories. If you want to see more gameplay,Go watch somebody on Youtube, like Sleepcycles (https://www.youtube.com/user/sleepcyclesgaming),Chubbyemu (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKOvOaJv4GK-oDqx-sj7VVg) or the current world record holder Horheristo (https://www.youtube.com/user/horheristo), i really enjoyed their gameplay Videos.Just pay those 12 Dollars, it's Definetly worth it.

number of helpful: 1 person found this review helpful
content:
, 2016
												Recommend Nuclear Throne is not an easy task, you must first recognize if you have a deeper problem of compulsive masochism, if you like to suffer, this is your game.Nuclear throne is a shooter with overhead view and Roguelike elements such as randomly generated scenarios, economy inventory and high difficulty, in which we have to shoot everything that looks like a threat (a "Shoot and then asks" full-fledged). For this purpose we use an absurd amount of weapons (+100) which are as useful as multifarious (guitars, lasers rays, bazookas, crossbows, etc.) and a concept called "Mutation", which is a type of modifier which is activated when you level up your character; there are all kinds of modifiers such as increasing life points, make enemies drop more likely to make or increase shooting accuracy, to name a few.Nuclear Throne have a lot of charismatic characters with different intrinsic skills; Crystal is a piece of purple quartz whose special ability is activate a shield that bounces from enemy bullets for 2 seconds, Steroids can use dual weapons or Chicken and his ability to throw their weapons at enemies.The main virtue of Nuclear Throne lies in the constant randomness and our ability to adapt to these situations, sometimes in the less pleasant ways and perhaps an unfair randomness in some sections, but never fault the game itself but rather by the failed approach we give to our plays. Our mission is to reach and defeat the Nuclear Throne, yes, but much matter how, the weapons I have, the mutations I have chosen, the character I'm playing, the arrangement and number of enemies and obstacles on stage. Everything under the halo of a subconscious immutable fluidity and rigor that enables playing with almost no major surprises to a true bullet hell situations.Perhaps Nuclear Throne is the highest point of Vlambeer as video game developer and in which their dual philosophy of direct fun and almost obscene depth is clearly note, it is a game that can end in 5 minutes, or get stuck for hours trying to discover new weapons, situations, enemies, characters, etc.Nuclear Throne is hard drug, so beware.___________________________________________________________________________________En español:Recomendar Nuclear Throne no es tarea sencilla, primeramente hay que reconocer si tienes un profundo problema de masoquismo compulsivo, si te gusta sufrir, este es tu juego. Nuclear throne es un shooter de vista cenital con elementos Roguelike tales como escenarios generados aleatoriamente, economía de inventario  y dificultad elevada, en el cual tenemos que dispararle a todo lo que se parezca a una amenaza (Un “Dispara y después pregunta” en toda regla). Para este fin nos valemos de una cantidad absurda de armas (+100) las cuales son tan útiles como variopintas (guitarras, rayos lasers, bazookas, ballestas, etc) y de un concepto llamado “Mutacion”, el cual consiste en un tipo de modificador el cual se activa al subir de nivel a nuestro personaje; hay todo tipo de modificadores tales como aumentar los puntos de vida, Hacer que los enemigos hagan drop con mayor probabilidad o aumentar la precisión de tiro, por citar algunos.En Nuclear Throne tenemos a unos personajes carismáticos y con diferentes habilidades intrínsecas; Crystal es un pedazo de Cuarzo morado que tiene como habilidad especial activar un escudo que hace rebotar las balas enemigas por 2 segundos, Steroids que puede usar armas duales o Chicken y su capacidad de lanzar sus armas a los enemigos. La principal virtud de Nuclear Throne reside en la aleatoriedad constante y en nuestra CAPACIDAD de adaptarnos a esas situaciones, a veces de las maneras menos placenteras y quizás con una aleatoriedad injusta en algunos tramos, pero nunca por fallo del propio videojuego sino más bien por el acercamiento fallido que le damos a nuestras partidas. Nuestra misión es llegar y derrotar al Trono Nuclear, sí, pero importa mucho el cómo, las armas que llevo, las mutaciones que he elegido, el personaje con el que estoy jugando, el arreglo y cantidad de los enemigos y obstáculos en el escenario. Todo bajo el inmutable halo de una fluidez subconciente y con el rigor que posibilita una partida sin casi mayores sobresaltos a verdaderos infiernos de balas. Quizás Nuclear Throne sea el punto más alto de Vlambeer como desarrolladora de videojuegos y en el cual se nota evidentemente esa filosofía dual de diversión directa y profundidad casi obscena, es un juego que puedes acabar en 5 minutos que tengas o quedarte atrapado por horas tratando de descubrir nuevas armas, situaciones, enemigos, personajes.Nuclear Throne es droga dura, así que, cuidado.(La heroina de los Ludopatas) xD

												100 hours in, and I just beat the Throne for the first time. Got more than my money's worth from this title. Similar gameplay to Binding of Isaac, but I personally enjoy the style of Nuclear Throne more. Some of the best feeling controls of any shooter. The biggest complaints I've seen are on the 30 fps cap and lack of online co-op. Neither of these have had any impact on my enjoyment of this game.EDIT: Online co-op has been added as a supported mod! Done by a single developer, YellowAfterlife. Easy to install and works wonderfully.
